name: ESPGALUDA II LITE
description:
### App Overview ###
Now you can play the arcade hit and Xbox360 shooting sensation ESPGALUDA II right at your fingertips on the iPhone and iPod touch!
Dodge and weave through waves of bullets as they fill the screen, and go for a high score!

### Praise for ESPGALUDA II ###
“Now that it's portable, Espgaluda II is a game that can truly be both casual and hardcore: a fun, satisfying time-killer as well as a high score-focused endurance run for the upper tier player on the go.”
- 1UP.com

“It is easily the best 2D shooter experience in the App Store.”
- TouchArcade.com

“It isn't just one of the best games on iPhone - it's one of the best shooters I've ever played.
Few games are this spectacular.”
- GamesRadar.com

### About the LITE Version ###
● ARCADE MODE AND SMARTPHONE MODE INCLUDED
Enjoy the excitement of the arcade in Arcade Mode!
Try out the new Awakening Pulse system in Smartphone Mode! Touch the bullets to destroy them!

● 3 UNIQUE CHARACTERS, 3 DIFFICULTIES, CONTROL AND SCREEN SETTINGS
With all of the customization options available at your fingertips, anyone from shooting game beginners to advanced players can enjoy the world of ESPGALUDA II!

● BGM updated for Smartphone Mode! Enjoy the original BGM for Arcade Mode!

● Ends at Stage 1 Boss.

● 3 unique characters selectable

● Only one difficulty level selectable

● Buttons can be customized like FULL Version.

### IMPORTANT ### : For those about to purchase this application, please read the below before purchasing.
ESPGALUDA II will only run on iPhone 3GS and 3rd Generation iPod touch and up (iOS 4.3 and up) and  iOS4.3 for iPad. Other devices are incompatible.
※Since this application uses a significant amount of memory, it is possible that it will crash when device memory is low. If this happens, please consult our Support Page.
※Turning the expand/shrink accessibility function "ON" may interfere with in-game play.

### IMPORTANT ### : There are iPhone/iPod touch and iPad2 versions of Espgaluda II.
1. The Full Version, which includes Arcade Mode and Smartphone Mode
2. Smartphone Version, with Smartphone Mode which includes use the new "Awakening Pulse" system
3. Arcade Version, with the same exciting gameplay as the arcade release
4. iPad 2 versions remastered in HD: Full Version, Smartphone Version, Arcade Version
Please take note of the version you want when you buy the game!
